metadata.name: PowerShell Script With File Upload Capabilities
metadata.comment: Detects PowerShell scripts leveraging the "Invoke-WebRequest" cmdlet to send data via either "PUT" or "POST" method.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-webrequest')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('iwr '))) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-method put')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-method post'))))

output.summary: Detects PowerShell scripts leveraging the "Invoke-WebRequest" cmdlet to send data via either "PUT" or "POST" method.
